definition: see 大旱望雲霓|大旱望云霓[da4 han4 wang4 yun2 ni2]
pinyin: da4 han4 zhi1 wang4 yun2 ni2

definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
